tns:patch.author: Armen Gharibyan
tns:patch.description: Add unaccent module If this patch failed please 1. Make sure the module unaccent is installed. See http://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.1/static/contrib.html for more info. 2. The query will not run if DB role has not superuser permission. Please connect to PostgreSql as super user and run the query once more.

script.lang: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS unaccent;
